metadata.title: CVE-2022-4904 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the c-ares package. The ares_set_sortlist is missingchecks about the validity of the input string, which allows a possiblearbitrary length stack overflow. This issue may cause a denial of serviceor a limited impact on confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: c-ares: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
